scenes.background: You are leading a project team that has just received an urgent assignment requiring a significant amount of work to be completed within a tight deadline. The team is feeling a lot of pressure, and morale is low, with some members showing signs of frustration and anxiety. Previously, when one of the team members, Alex, said, 'This is impossible! We can't get this done in time,' you responded by encouraging the team to stay focused and work together. During a team meeting, [Monica] slammed her pen on the table and added, 'Even if we try our best, there's no way we can meet this deadline.' [Bob] nodded in agreement, looking equally concerned. You suggested taking a pause to rethink the approach. Now, with the team gathered again, [Monica] leaned back in her chair, crossing her arms, and said, 'So, what’s the new grand plan?' You responded by suggesting to reassess the resources and see if additional support can be obtained. Now, [Bob] rubbed his temples and muttered, 'I just can't see how this will work. We're setting ourselves up for failure.' [Monica] exhaled deeply, clearly frustrated. You suggested taking it one step at a time by reassessing the resources and breaking down the tasks further. Despite your efforts, [Monica] and [Bob] still appear uneasy. [Monica] looks at her watch and says, 'Even with all this planning, we’re still running out of time.' [Bob] nods in agreement, his face showing signs of exhaustion.
scenes.description: Monica's impatience and Bob's exhaustion are evident. The team needs reassurance and a clear path forward.

options.text: Let's prioritize the tasks that have the highest impact and focus on those first. We can adjust our strategy as needed.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency and suggested a focused approach, showing good emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: I understand we're under a lot of pressure. Maybe we should consider asking for a deadline extension.
options.analysis: You recognized the pressure and suggested a practical solution to alleviate it, demonstrating good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: We've overcome challenging situations before. Let's focus on the critical tasks and show what we're capable of.
options.analysis: You focused on motivating the team by recalling past successes, demonstrating high motivation but lower empathy and emotional perception.
